wiki.content:
"Summer of '69" is a rock song written by Bryan Adams and Jim Vallance for Adams' fourth studio album Reckless (1984). It was the fourth single released from the album Reckless. It is one of Adams' most recognizable and popular songs. The song peaked at 5 on the Billboard Hot 100 and 40 on the Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. The song has appeared on all of Adams' compilation albums.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Summer of '69" is a rock song written by Bryan Adams and Jim Vallance for Adams' fourth studio album Reckless (1984). It was the fourth single released from the album Reckless. It is one of Adams' most recognizable and popular songs. The song peaked at 5 on the Billboard Hot 100 and 40 on the Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. The song has appeared on all of Adams' compilation albums.

track.name: Summer of '69
comments:
Summer of '69 <3
Those where the best days of my life ... :)
"69" sound better than "79" is probably why Brian used it (cause he would have been 8 ) Now I bet he did go to the drive inn at 8, could be his baby sitter was his first girlfriend! JUST SAYING!
@PleasedTaMeetYa:  lol, you don't have to take everything literally or as it really would be true. It's just a song. A great song.
Bryan Adams was about 8 years old in 1969.  But he had a band, went to drive ins, and even got a girlfriend.  WOW.
SUMMER I CANT WAIT OH YES  FUN FUN
v no. ...Played until my fingers bled, was the summer of sixty nine...
Got my first real six string,bought it at a five and dime...
